creator: lipp@danet.de
text:
If you use fo:table-and-caption, the result is just empty space, while
the same table as "stand-alone" table works.
Sorry, forgot, wasn't in the list: this applies to 0.20rc3
creator: lipp@danet.de
sandymac@ufl.edu
text:
If you check section B4 on the features page:
http://xml.apache.org/fop/implemented.html
You'll notice that fo:table-and-caption hasn't been implemented yet ... which,
by the way, I'd like implemented sooner than later for the purpose of converting
some docbook into pdf.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text: *** Bug 6537 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: feature is marked as not supported in http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/compliance.html
batch transition resolved+later to closed+later; if you have new information or a patch that addresses the issue, you may reopen
creator: gadams@apache.org
